General.Name: Made SA
General.Description: Made SA engages in the research, development, industrialization, marketing, and maintenance of solutions in the fields of electrical network operation, geo-location, overhead lines detection, telecoms, and defense. It primarily offers network measurement and detection systems, ranging from instruments for the identification of cables and their conductors to ground penetrating radar, as well as a range of galvanic isolators and high voltage line proximity warning systems. Made SA was founded in 1991 and is based in La Farlède, France.
General.Address: 167 Impasse de la Garrigue, La Farlède, France, 83210
